definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)

sentences.english: And for all I know, Ivan Ilyich had life insurance.
Most employers provide very basic life insurance for all their employees.
sentences.chinese: 多數僱主爲他們所有的僱員提供非常基本的人壽保險。

sentences.english: Now, I am a manager with China Life Insurance Company of China.
sentences.chinese: 現在，我是中國中國人壽保險公司的一名業務主任。

sentences.english: And he buys life insurance accordingly.
sentences.chinese: 而他也因此購買人壽保險。

sentences.english: Buying life insurance from Pingan is easy and so convenient.
sentences.chinese: 從平安購買人壽保險既容易又方便。

sentences.english: Your death benefit is the amount of life insurance plus the policy Account Value.
sentences.chinese: 你的死亡撫卹金是人壽保險和保險單賬價值的總量。

sentences.english: IF BANKS go bang, life insurance firms sputter.
sentences.chinese: 一旦銀行崩潰，那麼人壽保險公司就會破產。

sentences.english: Request information on  continuance of health and life insurance benefits.
sentences.chinese: 弄清楚人壽保險和健康保險的連續性。

sentences.english: A whole life policy can earn dividends.
sentences.chinese: 終身人壽保險可以獲得紅利。

sentences.english: The Nautilus Insurance Company was renamed the Ndw York Life Insurance Company.
sentences.chinese: 險公司更名爲紐約人壽保險公司。

sentences.english: Why don't you make it into full-blown life insurance?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼不變成全程的人壽保險呢？

sentences.english: Nothin' but a miserable little $500 equity in a life insurance policy.
sentences.chinese: 唯有一份不幸的500美元的人壽保險。

sentences.english: The life-insurance industry is an important piece of the U.
sentences.chinese: 人壽保險業是美國金融體系的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: Only last week I sold a life insurance policy to a 33-year-old man.
sentences.chinese: 上個星期我給一位只有33歲的人辦了人壽保險。

sentences.english: Okay, so how much life insurance do I need?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，有人會問我究竟需要多少人壽保險呢？

sentences.english: A life-insurance policy may serve as security for a loan.
sentences.chinese: 人壽保險可作貸款的抵押。

definition: life insurance/abbr. for 人壽保險|人寿保险
to settle a claim/claims settlement/payment of claims
to pay/to hand over (tax payment etc)
